articles.title: ICMR creates eco-friendly technology to kill mosquitoes - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: The World Health Organization (WHO) estimates that vector-borne illnesses account for more than 17% of all infectious diseases, killing over 700,000 people each year. They can be brought on by parasites, bacteria, or viruses.

articles.title: Wang Leehom's ex-wife Lee Jinglei denies rumours she was found in contempt of court - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Last week, rumours circulated that Lee was facing fines for not being able to produce evidence of Wang’s infidelities. She has posted a legal letter refuting this.
articles.content:
Following rumours that she had been found in contempt of court for failing to produce evidence of her ex-husbands infidelities, Lee Jinglei has spoken through her legal team to refute this.

articles.title: Johnny Depp's lawyers urge judge to leave jury verdict intact - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Depp's lawyers dispute arguments from Amber Heard's team that the jury's verdict was nonsensical and unfounded. They also say that the Heard team's complaints about a juror's identity are irrelevant.
articles.content: Lawyers for Johnny Depp are urging a Virginia judge to leave his US$10 million defamation judgment intact after attorneys for his ex-wife, Amber Heard, asked the judge to set aside the verdict on mul… [+2238 chars]

articles.title: Gallant Gilas stand falls short as China escapes with bronze - Rappler
articles.description: Gilas Pilipinas Men earn their best finish yet at the FIBA 3x3 Asia Cup despite falling short to China in the bronze medal match
